name: The Dropper 2 - Mini Survival FPS & Multiplayer Worldwide Game
name_original: The Dropper 2 - Mini Survival FPS & Multiplayer Worldwide Game
description:
The famous Mine Mini Game: THE DROPPER 2 come to iPhone/iPad now!

This game supports world wide multiplayer! Room can has up to 40 players! You can play it with other players all over the world.

FEATURES:

1. Multiplayer support: Worldwide.
2. Sky & Environment effect setting.
3. Detail effects: bullet holes & spark effect…
4. Chat System in game
5. Skin System(18 + skins)
6. Beautiful UI & comfortable control.
7. Profile System: (Weapon Equipping & SKin Set & Information & Reward).

Also, this game has great graphics, as you can see in the screen shot, it almost support all blocks as PC edition. It also support SMOOTH SHADOW too. In the game, you can set the FOV, view distance and many options.

Simple controls:
- Touch iPad to move. Also you can choose the hide the iPad graphics, and set "lefty" if necessary.
- Jump
- Click the "Sign" block to trigger event, such as start game.
- Click the block to attack it.

Game Features:
- Support world wide multiplayer, each room can has up to 40 players.
- Great graphics, support smooth shadow, and almost all blocks as PC edition. You can see the real screenshots below.
- Well designed maps, more and more maps will come in future updates.
- Has "Explore" mode to let you explore each map.
